articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: ‘Terrifier 3’ Tops Box Office With $18 Million Debut, ‘Joker: Folie à Deux’ Collapses With Brutal 81% Drop - Variety
articles.description: "Terrifier 3" slashed its way to No. 1 in North America, collecting a stellar $17 million over the weekend.
articles.content:
There’s only room for one killer clown at the top of box office charts.
“Terrifier 3” slashed its way to No. 1 in North America, collecting a stellar $18.3 million from 2,514 theaters in its opening… [+5536 chars]
